languages.text: "Передайте им: утверждение истинно. Истинный Мессия по имени Паскаль пришел, чтобы исправить ошибки предшественника и, искоренив раскол, вести флот Осознание в будущее".
"Tell them the statement is true. Pasqal, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."
languages.original_text: "Передайте им: утверждение истинно. Истинный Мессия по имени Паскаль пришел, чтобы исправить ошибки предшественника и, искоренив раскол, вести флот Осознание в будущее".

traits.locale_text: "Tell them the statement is true. The Pasqual the True Messiah has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."
"Tell them the statement is true. The Pasqual the True Messiah has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."
"Tell them the statement is true. Pasqual, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."
"Tell them the statement is true. Pasqual, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."
"Tell them the statement is true. Pasqal, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."

languages.text: “告诉他们，这种说法是正确的。真正的弥赛亚帕斯卡已经到来，准备纠正前任大贤者犯下的错误，弥补分裂，引导真理开拓者舰队走向未来。”
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Pasqal, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."

traits.locale_text: “告诉他们，这种说法是正确的。真正的弥赛亚帕斯卡已经到来，准备纠正前任大贤者犯下的错误，弥补分裂，引导真理开拓者舰队走向未来。”

languages.text: « Dites-leur que cette affirmation est vraie. Pasqal, le véritable messie, est venu pour rectifier les erreurs de son prédécesseur, combler le schisme et mener la Flotte de la Connaissance vers l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Pasqal, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."

traits.locale_text: « Dites-leur que cette affirmation est vraie. Pasqal, le véritable messie, est venu pour rectifier les erreurs de son prédécesseur, combler le schisme et mener la Flotte de la Connaissance vers l'avenir. »

languages.text: «Dígales que es verdad. Pasqal, el verdadero mesías, ha venido a enmendar los errores de su predecesor, ponerle fin al cisma y decidir el futuro de la Flota Conciencia».
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Pasqal, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."

traits.locale_text: «Dígales que es verdad. Pasqal, el verdadero mesías, ha venido a enmendar los errores de su predecesor, ponerle fin al cisma y decidir el futuro de la Flota Conciencia».

languages.text: 「その発言は真実であると伝えろ。前任者の過ちを正し、分裂を修復し、コグニサンス艦隊を未来へと導くために、真の救世主であるパスカルが到着した」
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Pasqal, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は真実であると伝えろ。前任者の過ちを正し、分裂を修復し、コグニサンス艦隊を未来へと導くために、真の救世主であるパスカルが到着した」

languages.text: "Sagt ihnen, dass die Aussage stimmt. Pasqal, der Wahre Messias, ist gekommen, um die Fehler seines Vorgängers zu korrigieren, die Spaltung zu beenden und die Erkenntnisflotte in die Zukunft zu führen."
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Pasqal, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt ihnen, dass die Aussage stimmt. Pasqual, der Wahre Messias, ist gekommen, um die Fehler seines Vorgängers zu korrigieren, die Spaltung zu beenden und die Erkenntnisflotte in die Zukunft zu führen."

languages.text: "Şu söylediklerimi ilet: Doğru. Sahih Mesih Pasqal; selefinin hatalarını telafi edecek, bölünmeyi sonlandıracak ve Malumat Filosu'nu yarınlara taşıyacak."
languages.original_text: "Tell them the statement is true. Pasqal, the True Messiah, has arrived to correct the mistakes of his predecessor, mend the schism and lead the Cognisance Fleet into the future."
